thread.section_title: AMIClubwear.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMIClubwear.com | www.amiclubwear.com
thread.title: Christina

author: Christina
title: Christina
text:
I love the shoes, the fit is a bit smaller than actual maybe just a half size so I'm a 71/2 i ordered 8 and thay was perfect.
The quality is very good.
Clothing differs, lingerie run very small im a medium ordered a lg and that was to small.
Other than size qualiry is ok, not great but will work for occasional wear.
Overall this is a great place for style, and the items for men are pretty cool too.
